overview: Joo-hee, who had no boyfriend until she turned 30, started dating her boss, but he is a married man with a family. After her affair with him is revealed, she leaves Seoul and she becomes a more mature woman. Wanting to forget her own past, she takes her job as curator of her watch museum, where she meets her six-year-old boy who wants to keep her pure feelings for her first love...
title: Greenhorn
